title: Dark Drones & Horror Ambience SFX, Dark Ambient Sounds
description: 100 professionally designed dark cinematic drones, horror ambiences & textures sound effects!
longDescription:
Youtube Demo: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6EeMV3snsVI


Ominous Drones sample pack features 100 cutting edge, dark cinematic drones sound effects (146 minutes in total) perfect for enhancing the anticipation and suspense in any sci-fi, thriller, or horror movie, video game, trailer, music track, etc.


From dark disturbing braam-like drones, dynamic and evolving ones, to the subtle eerie horror ambiences and dark atmospheres, this tension-driven sound collection will provide you with the right sonic tool to keep your audience on the edge of their seats. If youâ€™re looking for scary, post-apocalyptic, creepy ambient sounds, otherworldly and alien-like soundscapes, or dark and sinister dystopian textures, this sample pack is a must have!


If you like the sound of Ominous Drones then be sure to check out Annihilation, Dystopian Drones, and Into Abyss sound libraries as well!


Sound Effects List: https://www.soundresponse.net/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/Ominous-Drones-Sound-Effects-List.pdf
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 100

Number of Audio Cues: 100

Sample Rate/Bit Rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Minutes of Audio Provided: 146 min
